name: Energy Sources Game
description:
This is a game that I, and two others created for a college assignment that was given to us by an educational games company called EdArcade. The brief was to create an educational game based around climate change.

Team

Jacob Maidens - 3D modelling / Texturing , 2D Asset creation , UE4 Programming 

Alex Bonham - Level Design

Luke Clamp - Sound / Music Design and creation
